moon_in_cancer.effect: Emotional depth and strong maternal instincts, deeply connected to home and family.

sun_in_7th.effect: Ego issues in partnerships or marriage, need for recognition from spouse.
sun_in_7th.remedy: Practice humility and appreciate your partner.

jupiter_in_10th.effect: Great career success, wisdom in profession, and good reputation.
jupiter_in_10th.remedy: Be charitable and guide others in their careers.
